title: Executive Order 12717-Revoking Executive Order No. 12691
content: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and laws of the United States of America, and since the President's Advisory Committee on the Points of Light Initiative Foundation ("Committee") has completed its tasks, it is hereby ordered that Executive Order No. 12691, which established the Committee, is revoked.
citation: George Bush, Executive Order 12717-Revoking Executive Order No. 12691 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/269032
